smile.nlp.collocation

Class BigramCollocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.nlp.collocation.BigramCollocation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<BigramCollocation>

    public class BigramCollocation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<BigramCollocation>
    Collocations are expressions of multiple words which commonly co-occur. A bigram collocation is a pair of words w1 w2 that appear together with statistically significance.

    • Constructor Summary
